channel.title: Comments on: Links for Thu 13 Dec 2007

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.content:encoded:
@Deane –

The quote is from an article that claims that the only advantage WordPress has was that it was open source and that now with MTOS there was no advantage.

I didn’t take it as a dig on MT, but as a dig on the article. It was funny in that context. I should have resisted the urge to link to it.

item.title: By: Deane
item.dc:creator: Deane
item.description: That quote (not yours, I know) implying that Movable Type "sucks" is way, way off-base. I love WordPress and my company uses it as a base for dozens of projects, but Movable Type is still a hell of a piece of software. The odd use of Perl aside, MT is one of the most well-written and well-designed platforms I've ever used.
item.content:encoded: That quote (not yours, I know) implying that Movable Type “sucks” is way, way off-base. I love WordPress and my company uses it as a base for dozens of projects, but Movable Type is still a hell of a piece of software. The odd use of Perl aside, MT is one of the most well-written and well-designed platforms I’ve ever used.
